attributes.title: Special - Warthog Flip in Real Life
attributes.caption: What does it take to flip a life-size Warthog? In this special Red vs Blue episode of Immersion, Burnie and his team find out...with some explosive results.
attributes.description: What does it take to flip a life-size Warthog? In this special Red vs Blue episode of Immersion, Burnie and his team find out...with some explosive results.
attributes.display_title: Special - Warthog Flip in Real Life

attributes.title: The Warthog Flip - Behind The Scenes
attributes.caption: What does it take to flip up a warthog? Then blow it up? Find out how the crew pulls off one of the biggest episodes of Immersion ever.
attributes.description: What does it take to flip up a warthog? Then blow it up? Find out how the crew pulls off one of the biggest episodes of Immersion ever.
attributes.display_title: The Warthog Flip - Behind The Scenes

attributes.title: Hitman in Real Life
attributes.caption: ​On the Season Premiere of Immersion, Michael and Gavin must take on multiple disguises to sneak through a crowded ballroom and assassinate Congressman Mike Hawk.
attributes.description: On the Season Premiere of Immersion, Michael and Gavin must take on multiple disguises to sneak through a crowded ballroom and assassinate Congressman Mike Hawk.

attributes.title: Hitman in Real Life - Featuring Chris and Bruce
attributes.caption: Who is the better spy? Chris or Bruce?
attributes.description: Who is the better spy? Chris or Bruce?
attributes.display_title: Hitman in Real Life - Featuring Chris and Bruce

attributes.title: Hitman in Real Life - Behind the Scenes
attributes.caption: Two hundred extras, over 20 cameras, and 4 idiot lab rats… How did we pull it off? Thanks to all our RTX attendees for making this episode possible!

attributes.title: Resident Evil in Real Life
attributes.caption: ​In this episode of Immersion, our Lab Rats must survive a gauntlet of zombies and dark corridors as they test the many camera perspectives from the Resident Evil franchise.
attributes.description: In this episode of Immersion, our Lab Rats must survive a gauntlet of zombies and dark corridors as they test the many camera perspectives from the Resident Evil franchise.

attributes.title: Resident Evil in Real Life - Featuring Lindsay and Mica
attributes.caption: Lindsay and Mica utilize their charm and wits to fight off their zombie attackers. But will it be enough to survive this special Immersion?
attributes.description: Lindsay and Mica utilize their charm and wits to fight off their zombie attackers. But will it be enough to survive this special Immersion?
attributes.display_title: Resident Evil in Real Life - Featuring Lindsay and Mica

attributes.title: Resident Evil in Real Life - Behind the Scenes
attributes.caption: Watch Burnie and the crew of Immersion squirm as they create a zombie apocalypse from scratch.

attributes.title: Destructibles in Real Life
attributes.caption: Real world objects vs video game objects. Gavin and Michael must smash, crash and demolish their way through famous props from games like Half Life 2, Zelda and Rainbow Six: Siege.
attributes.description: Real world objects vs video game objects. Gavin and Michael must smash, crash and demolish their way through famous props from games like Half Life 2, Zelda and Rainbow Six: Siege. Watch the Bonus Episode featuring Adam and Jeremy!

attributes.title: Destructibles in Real Life - Featuring Adam and Jeremy
attributes.caption: Adam and Jeremy must race against time to finish the Destrucibles course. But, what happens when on is given real world objects and the other video game objects?
attributes.description: Adam and Jeremy must race against time to finish the Destrucibles course. But, what happens when on is given real world objects and the other video game objects?
attributes.display_title: Destructibles in Real Life - Featuring Adam and Jeremy

attributes.title: Surgeon Simulator in Real Life
attributes.caption: ​Gavin and Michael must operate on a familiar face before blood loss kills their patient in this Surgeon Simulator Immersion.
attributes.description: Gavin and Michael must operate on a familiar face before blood loss kills their patient in this Surgeon Simulator Immersion.

attributes.caption: ​Can Gavin and Michael perform surgery inside a moving ambulance?

attributes.title: NBA Jam in Real Life
attributes.caption: ​Can a flaming basketball really improve your basketball game?
attributes.description: Can a flaming basketball really improve your basketball game? Gavin and Michael are burning to find out.
